title: SCP-005-J
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:jakstyle]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:fade-in speed=1]]

[[div style="background: url(https://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/format-hell/scp_trans.png) bottom center no-repeat; text-align: center; width: 600px; margin: 0 auto; font-size: 20px; padding: 0px; filter: invert(1);"]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
++* ##cyan|ATTENTION##
##black|SCP-005-J IS A TYPE-11 INFOHAZARD WHICH ONLY AFFECTS CURRENT MEMBERS OF THE OVERSEER COUNCIL.
TO PREVENT A ZK-CLASS REALITY FAILURE, A SECONDARY MEMETIC HAZARD HAS BEEN EMBEDDED INTO ALL DOCUMENTS PERTAINING TO SCP-005-J.##
[[/=]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[/div]]
----

Attempting access while being a member of the Overseers Council is grounds for indefinite suspension from the Council and all included benefits (including death). Due to SCP-005-J's effects no medical assistance shall be given upon an infohazard breach and  MTF Alpha-5 ("Cake Boys") will be deployed and authorized to use lethal force.
By continuing to access the document you hereby consent to exposure to an unknown level-5 Cognitohazardous image, and verify that you are not a current member of the O5 Council.

[[div class="blockquote" style="> border-radius: 10px; margin: 10px"]]
@@@@
//I know the goal of the Overseers is to oversee everything within the Foundation. But sometimes even we are better left in the dark. Trust me. This is something you should avert your eyes from. Really.//
@@@@
//-The Administrator//
[[/div]]

@@@@
**Item #:** SCP-005-J


**Object Class:** Keter 

**Special Containment Procedures:** Because SCP-005-J can cause an XK-Class End of the World Scenario upon O5 Command gaining knowledge of it, no sitting members of the Overseer Council are permitted to view any documents or affiliated files regarding the true nature of SCP-005-J.

Personnel that are promoted to a position at the Overseer Council must visit Site Command for administration of Class A amnestics before starting active duty at the Council.

Personnel involved in the containment of SCP-005-J are to use backup systems and backdoors into SCiPnet to share information. Automated systems within RAISA are in place to remove these files from Command Terminals and terminate them in the event of an information breach.
[[=]]
= [[size 125%]]##red|**UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES SHOULD EVER O5 COMMAND SEE THIS FILE!!!**##[[/size]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[=]]
[[collapsible show="SUBMIT NON-OVERSEER-LEVEL CREDENTIALS" hide="WELCOME TO THE PARTY"]]
[[<]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[=]]
**Where No Eye Reaches**
[[/=]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[=image Cakestuff]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[=]]
**Identity confirmed. Security measures disengaged.**
**Welcome, authorized personnel. Let's get the party started.**
[[/=]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote" style="> border-radius: 10px; margin: 10px"]]
Welcome to the Party. 
@@@@
If you are still wondering what the anomaly is, let me break the ice and reveal there’s no such thing as SCP-005-J. Although a mild memetic hazard has been included in this file, this memetic hazard will only affect members of the O5 Council.
@@@@
So, why all this secrecy you ask? Why go behind the Overseers’ back and do this? 
Well, there’s an actual problem we need to solve. It’s not a Keter or an end of the world scenario we are dealing with this time, although utmost secrecy will be required.

The problem we have at hand is finding birthday gifts for the O5 Council.

After what we pulled last year I think all our lines with Dr. Wondertainment will be monitored, so this time we will be on our own to create a big party.

Also, the Administrator informed me we are no longer allowed to use any Keter class SCP's to bring excitement to the party. Yes, this includes the Pinata sadly. 

We do not need the Ethics Committee's approval, however!

Put down your suggestions in this document and let’s make this a birthday to remember!
.
@@@@
-Maria Jones, Head of the Party Committee. 
[[/div]]


[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
